title: Water Strider
summaries: The Water Strider is a harmless critter that spawns on bodies of water on the Surface during the day. It only spawns near Sand or Jungle grass blocks, but not in the Ocean biome. It will not spawn if the wind speed exceeds 20 mph. Gold Water Striders have a 0.25*1/400 (0.25%) chance to spawn in place of the regular variant.
The Water Strider moves by gliding on water and hopping around on land. Due to having only 5 health and no defense, it is often killed instantly by enemies or players.

It can be caught with any <linked>Bug Net</linked> to be carried around in the <linked>inventory</linked> and released later, or crafted into a <linked>Water Strider Cage</linked> to be used as decorative <linked>furniture</linked>. Once crafted, the caged Water Strider cannot be released again, and when placed down it moves around inside the cage as it would do outside.
